mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PPALDAK_FISHS (FSH_ID, FSH_OWNER, FSH_NM, FSH_MAXPWR, FSH_AVGPWR, FSH_DATE, FSH_TIME, FSH_TIMEING, FSH_GPSLAT, FSH_GPSLOT) VALUES(#{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{maxPower}, #{avgPower}, #{date}, #{time}, #{timeing}, #{GPSLat}, #{GPSLot})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_PPALDAK_FISHS WHERE 1 = 1
AND FSH_DATE BETWEEN #{stDate} AND #{endDate}
AND UPPER(FSH_SPECIES) LIKE "%"|| UPPER(#{species, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ||"%"
ORDER BY FSH_NAME ASC
